1.name: Artillery Command: Cruisers
1.description: Increases the FP of all friendly Cruisers by $1. Does not stack with the same skill.

2.name: Double Gun
2.description: When this ship fires its Main Guns: $1 chance to fire its Main Guns twice.

3.name: All Out Assault Ⅰ
3.description: Activate All Out Assault Ⅰ: Wichita once every 12 times the main gun is fired.

1.name: Wichita
1.description: Wichita-class heavy cruiser – Wichita, Hull Number CA-45! <color=#fad545>Unlock build after receiving</color>

limitBreak.tier1: Unlock All Out Assault Ⅰ/Main gun efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: Improve All Out Assault/All weapons' efficiency +5%

1.chinese: 威奇塔级重巡洋舰—威奇塔，舷号CA-45<color=#fad545>获得后将解锁建造</color>
1.japanese: ウィチタ級重巡洋艦・ウィチタ
1.english: Wichita-class heavy cruiser – Wichita, Hull Number CA-45! <color=#fad545>Unlock build after receiving</color>

2.chinese: 独一无二的大将军就是我威奇塔大人了！ 哼，只要是我出手，哪怕是航母也不在话下，所以期待你的表现啊，指挥官
2.japanese: 唯一無二たる海の猛将こそ、この私・ウィチタ様よ！私が手を下せば空母でも蹂躙してみせるーーだから、指揮官よ、お前の力も期待させてもらうわよ
2.english: I am the one and only fearless general of the seas, Lady Wichita! Even carriers would be crushed beneath my feet, if I wanted to end them myself. That's why, Commander, I'll be expecting much of you.

3.chinese: 你就是指挥官？很好，今天起你就是我威奇塔的军师，征服这片大海就靠你了
3.japanese: お前が指揮官かい？よし、今日からお前が私の参謀よ。この海を征服するため力を尽せ！
3.english: You're the commander? Very well. Starting today you will be my adviser. You will devote your time to helping me conquer the seas!

4.chinese: 回来了吗，让我好等，准备出征了
4.japanese: 戻ったか。私をまたせたわね。出立の用意を
4.english: You've returned. You really kept me waiting. Get ready to depart.

5.chinese: 重型巡洋舰的标杆，好好体会吧
5.japanese: 重巡の基準たる私の力、味わいな！
5.english: Relish in the power of a true heavy cruiser!

7.chinese: 看到了吗，我们的征途是这汪洋大海！
7.japanese: 見たか、我が征くはこの蒼き海の果なり！
7.english: Look! Our conquest extends to the ends of this blue sea!

8.chinese: 没有什么是一炮不能解决的！
8.japanese: この巨砲の一射で、解決できない問題などない！
8.english: There exists no problem that a shot from my huge cannons cannot resolve!

9.chinese: 怎么了，想和我过过招吗？
9.japanese: どうした、手合わせしたいのか？
9.english: What is it, want to have a go with me?

10.chinese: 你小子想尝尝鞭子的滋味吗？
10.japanese: このムチを味わいたいか？
10.english: Are you trying to get a taste of my whip?

11.japanese: 新しい任務？読み上げなさい
11.english: A new mission? Read it out loud for me.

12.japanese: この私にボーナスだと！？

13.chinese: 邮件这种东西你全权负责就好了
13.japanese: メールなんざ、お前に一任する
13.english: I'm entrusting the mail to you.

14.chinese: 指挥辛苦了，你也休息一下吧
14.japanese: 指揮ご苦労だ。お前も休んでなさい
14.english: Good work, Commander. You should rest as well.

15.chinese: 嗯？委托完成了啊……哼，我们舰队兵强马壮，几个委托自然是不在话下的
15.japanese: うん？委託が完了したか……ふん、我が艦隊の強盛を持ってすれば委託など容易いものだ
15.english: Hm? Looks like a commission's been completed... Hmph, a few commissions are easy pickings for our mighty fleet.

18.chinese: 哈！虾兵蟹将，不是我一合之敌
18.japanese: ハッ！雑魚どもが、相手にもならぬわ！
18.english: Hah! These weaklings are no match for me!

19.japanese: これこそ面白い。ふん、引くぞ！
19.english: Now this is interesting. Hmph, fall back!

20.english: This shot will be it for you!

21.japanese: 秘蔵の策でも披露してはどうだ？
21.english: How about unveiling what secret plan you have in store for me?

22.chinese: 啊，看来我的眼光有问题啊……找了这么个废柴……
22.japanese: ふん、私も見る目がないようだ……まさかこんな役立たずを頼りにするとは……
22.english: Hmph, it seems I made the wrong decision... by relying on someone as useless as you...

23.chinese: 我的梦想就是征服世界！征服以后干什么？哼，我怎么知道！
23.japanese: 私の夢は世界征服だ！世界を征服した後？ふん、そんなもの知るか！
23.english: My dream is to conquer the world! What happens after I've done that? Hmph, who cares about that!

24.chinese: 好奇这根鞭子吗，其实只是过去随便买的，用着还挺顺手就一直用着了，用来指地图的时候还是挺好用的
24.japanese: このムチに興味あるか？まあ昔適当に買ったものだが、意外と使い勝手がよい。特に地図を叩く時にな
24.english: You're curious about my whip? Well, I bought it on a whim long ago, but it's been surprisingly useful. Particularly when I'm pointing at a map.

25.chinese: 虽然是事到如今，不过谢谢你一直陪我任性啊……以后也可以？哈，不愧是我看上的指挥官！
25.japanese: 今更だが、私のわがままに付き合ってくれて、本当は感謝したいものだ…これからも付き合ってあげてもいい、と？はっ！流石私が見つけた指揮官だ！
25.english: Though it may be a little late, I really wanted to thank you for putting up with my selfishness and staying with me... Will you continue doing so? Hah! That's just that what I wanted to hear, Commander!

26.chinese: 我说指挥官，虽然一开始只是开玩笑，现在我感觉我们联手的话说不定真的能征服这片大海啊！反正我的东西就是你的东西，我们到时候也不用分嘛，对不对！
26.japanese: 指揮官よ。最初は冗談のつもりだったが、今は私達が力を合わせれば、もしかしたら本当にこの海を征服できるかもしれない！まあ私のものはお前のものだ、山分けすることもなかろう。そうだろ？
26.english: Listen, Commander. I was just joking about it at first, but if we join forces, we might just be able to conquer the entire ocean! Since what's mine is yours, there won't be any need to split everything equally, am I right?

27.chinese: 我当你是亲友……不对，我好像也没把你当亲友——等等，让我理一理，啊，我不是拒绝的意思…等一下让我整理一下心情……
27.japanese: お前のことは親友……いや、親友として接するつもりはないーーちょっと待て、今整理する、いや、別に断るというわけでは…少し心を整理させてくれ……
27.english: I see you as my best friend... No, I'm not planning on treating you as my best friend... Hold on, let me think for a moment. No, that doesn't mean I'm turning you down... Just give me some time to ready my heart for this...

28.chinese: 哈哈哈，来个让我满意的计策吧！
28.japanese: アハハハハハハ！この私を満足できる秘策を披露してみせろ！
28.english: Ahahahahahaha! Show me what secret plans you have in store to satisfy me with!
